name: Unstable Transmitter
desc: Falling below 25% health gives you 60% of your maximum health as a temporary barrier . Gain a dimensional aura for 8s that bleeds and teleports away enemies. Enemies killed by the aura extend the duration by 1s. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.
notes:
Unstable Transmitter is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
The item grants the   Dimensional Aura buff. Upon falling below 25% health, the item's holder receives 60% of their maximum health as barrier and gains a small spherical aura that teleports and   bleeds enemies that enter it. The aura lasts for 8 seconds, but enemies killed by the aura increase its duration by 1 second each. When the effect ends, the item is consumed, and it regenerates at the beginning of each stage.


== Notes ==
The buffs duration cannot exceed 10s from killing enemies.
Items that are consumed at low health, such as  Delicate Watch and  Power Elixir, will not be consumed when the Unstable Transmitter's effect is triggered.
Teleporting enemies inflicts them with 3 stacks of   Bleed.
The item has a 1.1 second internal cooldown, so multiple can not be used in quick succession.


== Lore ==
"You touch it.
"No way, you touch it."

-Signal echoes, UES Safe Travels


== Version History ==
Update Notes V1.3.8
Unstable Transmitter now grants 60% barrier on activation (up from 35%). It has also had its internal cooldown changed from 45 seconds to 1.1 seconds, for those of you that choose to hoard several Transmitters at a time.
Update Notes V1.3.7
Unstable Transmitter can now only be activated once per stage and barrier gain has been reduced to 35% of maximum health (was 75%.) Item regenerates at the start of each stage. One Shot Protection removed.
Correction: The items holder now gains 50% of their maximum health as barrier, not 35%.
Update Notes V1.3.6
Unstable Transmitter
Old Functionality - When reaching below 25% health the Survivor explodes, dealing 350% (+350% per item stack) damage to nearby enemies and teleporting to a random location. This effect has a cooldown of 2 minutes (-5% per item stack).
Updated Functionality - Falling below 25% health gives you 75% of your maximum health as a temporary barrier. Gain a dimensional aura for 8s that bleeds and teleports away enemies. Enemies killed by the aura extend the duration by 1s. Recharges every 45s (-10% per stack.)
Blacklisted  Unstable Transmitter,  Breaching Fin and  Sonorous Whispers from situations where enemies can obtain items (such as Simulacrum.)
Seekers of the Storm
Added 18 Pickups
Unstable Transmitter
